overview:
Bosworth is responsible for sales, professional services and alliance activities in North America. Bosworth, who joined Saba in 2004, has most recently been responsible for growing revenue and market share in North America through both direct and indirect channels. He brings more than 25 years of enterprise technology sales leadership and a strong focus on customer satisfaction to his position.

Before joining Saba, Bosworth served for more than four years as the Regional Vice President of Sales for Docent. Prior to Docent, Bosworth held senior sales management positions at Vantive, PeopleSoft, Verity and Oracle.

Bosworth earned a Bachelor of Science in Marketing and an MBA from the University of Illinois.

relationships.title: President, Saba North America and Public Sector
